body.p:
Lexington Ky
March 27th 1865
His Excellency
T. E. Bramlette
Dear Sir

At the request of Mr Charles Craig, I write this merely as a friend, he is one of several who were Indicted at the Feb term of the Fayette Circuit Court for Faro Dealing he has Confessed Judgment & desires that you remit his fine. I would respectfully request your Excellency to do so if consistent with your duty

I am Gov
yours truly
J K. Edwards
